author: Ted Byrne
content: I like it when you do this stuff... you are so the master of the complex metallic reflections... Reflections that seem to float on colors that you remind me that exist at night. It is so difficult to color balance these things, and to sense their presence. You know one of my two favorite Manessinger's, a print I am proud to own, and this rivals that. Congrats Andreas. Keep amazing us.
